December 29, 2015

Mad Universe Wins Emmy

In June 2015, Chris Mortensen received a L.A. area Emmy Award for writing and directing a one hour special for ABCTV celebrating Childrenâ€™s Hospital Los Angeles. The special was produced by Hollywood-based Yu & Company. Executive producers Garson Yu and Carol Wong also received Emmys.
